amendment.description: To ensure that authorizing committees receive timely information from the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 70 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 70 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 26.
